segments.en: Linked Discourses 55
1. At Bamboo Gate
5. With Sāriputta (2nd)

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Sāriputta went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side. The Buddha said to him:
“Sāriputta, they speak of a ‘factor of stream-entry’.
What is a factor of stream-entry?”

segments.pli: “Sappurisasaṃsevo hi, bhante, sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, saddhammassavanaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, yonisomanasikāro sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, dhammānudhammappaṭipatti sotāpattiyaṅgan”ti.
segments.en: “Sir, the factors of stream-entry are associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, proper attention, and practicing in line with the teaching.”
“Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Sappurisasaṃsevo hi, sāriputta, sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, saddhammassavanaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, yonisomanasikāro sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, dhammānudhammappaṭipatti sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ.
segments.en: For the factors of stream-entry are associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, proper attention, and practicing in line with the teaching.
Sāriputta, they speak of ‘the stream’.
What is the stream?”

segments.pli: “Ayameva hi, bhante, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto, seyyathidaṃ—
segments.en: “Sir, the stream is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:

segments.pli: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhī”ti.
segments.en: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.”
“Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Ayameva hi, sāriputta, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto, seyyathidaṃ—
segments.en: For the stream is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
Sāriputta, they speak of ‘a stream-enterer’.
What is a stream-enterer?”

segments.pli: “Yo hi, bhante, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno, svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto”ti.
segments.en: “Sir, anyone who possesses this noble eightfold path is called a stream-enterer, the venerable of such and such name and clan.”
“Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Yo hi, sāriputta, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno, svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto”ti.
segments.en: For anyone who possesses this noble eightfold path is called a stream-enterer, the venerable of such and such name and clan.”

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha asks Sāriputta about the four factors for stream-entry: association with good people, hearing the teaching, proper attention, and right practice. He also defines the “stream” and the “stream-enterer”.
